sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		make as string,
		model as string,
		year as string,
		color as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		make as string,
		model as string,
		year as integer,
		color as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(input(
		make as string,
		model as string,
		year as string,
		color as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
